Html:
Chart Controls for WPF still seems to be in Preview Quality Band.

1 - Does someone know when Chart Controls will be available in Stable Quality Band?

2 - Are we going to have a new version with .NET / WPF 4.5?

3 - Is it judicious to use this current version (Preview Quality Band) for production?

4 – Any real documentation somewhere for these controls?

Thanks

Olivier
